data.text:
@EricTopol @hippopedoid Russia claims 1,000 deaths a day.

That's horrible enough.

T.E.D. sampling indicates it's 3,000 a day.

Well, vaxxing runs 30% for adults. Both Putin and the Russians are stooooopid.

@AziBerl @EricTopol @hippopedoid data source: CDC
And evidence true excess deaths are up to 1.35M https://t.co/mOap5ojM3K

@EricTopol @hippopedoid It's no secret. Still back in Nov2021, Rosstat reported more than 700k excess deaths, while the official covid death toll was 235k
In fairness, as of 01Feb2022, the US had 917k official covid deaths, but 1.2M official excess deaths. And evidence true excess deaths are up to 1.35M https://t.co/Pv2E6C2vMF
@BallouxFrancois @EricTopol @hippopedoid Interesting. Has Benford’s law been violated too? Not sure if it’s a good gauge with this data?
@EricTopol @Cleavon_MD @hippopedoid Turns out Russia lies about everything

@EricTopol @hippopedoid Except that their death counts have been rising since that 'study'.  Their health minister has already stated that the old data has to be restated upwards by two-thirds.  Conversely, a number of US states were in process of restating due to deaths from other causes.
